text:
Every one I’ve ever tried was trash, so I was like “Phew, my job is still safe.”
If this has changed or anyone has uncovered a good one, I’m curious, too!

elements.text:
Every one I’ve ever tried was trash, so I was like “Phew, my job is still safe.”
If this has changed or anyone has uncovered a good one, I’m curious, too!

text:
I use Topic extensively and it's one of my favorite tools ever. We don't have to worry about AI tools replacing us any time soon.

Most of them are using GPT-3 which limits the AI generated copy to 400 characters. So they're decent for copywriting, but long-form writers have nothing to fear.

Topic is definitely worth it for us because it makes generating briefs so much easier. And most of the content we write using Topic ends up ranking well. Semrush + Topic is basically our content stack and they'vepaid dividends

text:
<@UJ3K7N8GJ>

_Do they help? Is it worth the cost?_ 

Yes, Ai tools have cut down my writing time by 50% which means I can produce double the content at good quality in the same amount of time (or take a break).

_Will we all lose our jobs to AI?_ 

Not in the short term. There are limitations. Jarvis for example can't do research, edit, write in a nuanced tone of voice, add content to Wordpress, source images, and more.

I actually posted a video on this topic on Linkedin a few days ago.

<https://www.screencast.com/t/qLc1B6CcX>
